The Vermont Statutes Online

Title 2: Legislature

Chapter 001: General Assembly

§ 1. Place of holding sessions

§ 1. Place of holding sessions

The sessions of the General Assembly shall be held in Montpelier.

See section 2 of this title.

Added 2015, No. 10, § 1.

§ 2. Use of hall and Senate chamber

§ 2. Use of hall and Senate chamber

The Representatives' Hall and Senate Chamber shall not be used for non-legislative purposes.

Amended 2020, No. 55, § 2.

§ 5. Repealed. 1979, No. 200 (Adj. Sess.), § 120.

§ 5. Repealed. 1979, No. 200 (Adj. Sess.), § 120.
